name: #14 Aswatama
description:
A Warrior of Kurava and the only son of Mahaguru Drona and Wilotama, a celestial goddess cursed in a horse form. Expert in the art of warfare, Aswatama also posses deadly celestial weapons that are able to destroy the entire battlefield. One of the weapon that Aswatama posses is Narayanastra, that fires a volley of millions of deadly missiles. Kresna is the only one knows how to stop the weapon.

At the end of Bharatayuddha, Aswatama was cursed to live an eternal live while his wounds would never heal.
